effect_entries.effect: Allows the trainer to enter the desert on []{location:hoenn-route-111}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A pair of protective goggles.
They enable a TRAINER to travel
through even desert sandstorms.

Nifty goggles that
protect eyes from
desert sandstorms.

Nifty goggles that
protect eyes from
desert sandstorms.
